name: Peaks
description:
:

We are a 3 person team of artists, including a professional animator, a professional illustrator/designer and a talented art student. This game was a 48 hour all-nighter labor of love, and in spite of its little imperfections (sorry if you get caught on walls while jumping), we really think you're going to enjoy the unique mechanic of shifting between our two little mountains. 

Credits:

  • Shaun Bartoo
  • Michael Chang
  • Andrew Yan

special thanks to Dare and Colyde for brainstorming and sound support.
